items.name: Chole Rice Bowl
items.description: Indulge in our flavorful Chole Rice, where tender chickpeas simmered in aromatic spices meet fluffy rice, creating a satisfying meal that's both comforting and delicious. Perfectly paired for a hearty lunch or dinner, this classic dish is a favorite for its rich flavors and simplicity. Dive into a bowl of Chole Rice and experience the essence of Indian cuisine in every bite.
